channel.title: Blast Pit: all stuck posts collection
channel.description:
![](upload://wdV65RNawqsYNnwoA00xNrBYwHh.jpeg) ![](upload://nmZt4ygeU8CvLo7wrEXykkfuevZ.jpeg)
So when I go to start the rocket, it won't let me. I turned on both valves and on the control panel next to the button that turns on the rocket, it shows that the oxygen is on but the fuel is not. I have turned on the exhaust as well.

item.title: Blast Pit: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: Lady_Grey
item.description:
Solokiller:

You have to jump over the fan, if you look up you’ll notice wooden boards on the ceiling, break those.

Oh my Jesus, thank you. NEVER would’ve figured that out. I saw the planks and such floating and even jumped a few times (on the ledge though, so it didn’t work) just to be sure, but was convinced I was too heavy.

Read full topic
item.source: Blast Pit: all stuck posts collection

item.title: Blast Pit: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: Lady_Grey
item.description:
You turn on the giant fan to help restore power to the rockets…so that you can kill the large creature and use the old rail system. I can’t get back out of the waterways to continue storing power. I finished turning on the fan and now I’m stuck. The barrels didn’t work…only one of the five I brought to the water floated.

xilef:

Perhaps they mean where the elevator fell and is now under the radioactive waste? You need to turn on the power (Hit two switches IIRC) and then climb the ladder back to the top.

I can’t REACH the ladder, it is far too high up. I’m not at the radioactive area where the elevator fell, I did that part first.

Read full topic
item.source: Blast Pit: all stuck posts collection

item.title: Blast Pit: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: Mont_Blanc
item.description:
Lady_Grey:

I’ve started the giant fan, but now I can’t get out of the water tunnels…tried turning valves, the ladder is too high, tried messing with the underwater elevator…I’m at a loss.

Could you be more specific ? Fans are rather common in HL.

Read full topic
item.source: Blast Pit: all stuck posts collection

item.title: Blast Pit: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: Xilefian
item.description:
Lady_Grey:

I’ve started the giant fan, but now I can’t get out of the water tunnels…tried turning valves, the ladder is too high, tried messing with the underwater elevator…I’m at a loss.

Is this after the on a rail part?
If you played half-life 2 you’ll get what to do, it’s not very obvious and probably should be highlighted better somehow, you have to get the barrels that are floating on the surface and place them under the platform that is leaning into the water, this creates a walk-way that you can jump across when you go around to get on top of it.

Read full topic

item.description:
You have to use grenades to distract it and get past it through the several entrances around it. Turn on the Oxygen and the Power and return there and the button will activate.

item.description:
Red means no. You need to get past the tentacle and turn on the fuel and oxygen to fire the rocket and kill it. There’s whole levels to go before you can kill it, yet.

item.description:
You have to fuel and turn the power on - have you done that?
The monster responds to noise, so your grenades can lure it away when you go down to turn on the power/fuel.

item.title: Blast Pit: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: NoyzRulz
item.description:
Not sure how he made out but after completing this boss I headed down the hole like the original game but it has changed. When you hit the bottom of the ladder there is a door that does not open and you can swim a bit further down though I can’t find anywhere to go. It used to be land, loot some stuff, down a hold and jump into water. Not this time Can you elaborate?

Read full topic

item.description:
Hello can any help on the stage at bm_c1a4b i have past the some kind of octopus past that than activate power on com back to the octopus and there is a red button saying fire. I have picked up c4 ammo what is that for ?

1024×576 662 KB

and the fire button not working have i missed summat out

item.title: Blast Pit: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: gnrslash95
item.description:
Im not best at explaining things so just bear with me.
If you are hundred percent sure you turned all the powers,
you have to go back to the room where a scientist got killed by that tentacle through the window. Judging by the statement, “the fire button for the missile is red” i assume you know where that is. Then you have to press “E” to launch, then huge explosion kills that monster.
If nothing happens, i would make sure you turned all the powers.

Read full topic
